I have finally updated <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/rgriff23/btw">`btw`</a> to run <a target="_blank" href="https://www.evolution.rdg.ac.uk/BayesTraits.html">BayesTraitsV3</a> from R on both Mac OS and Windows systems. Shout out to <a target="_blank" href="http://dk-giscience.zgis.net/index.php/37-website/256-ranacher-peter">Peter Ranacher</a> for contributing code to run `btw` functions on Windows. The updated [tutorial](/projects/btw) on my projects page shows how to access the functionality of BayesTraitsV3 with `btw`.
